Acho que estava em coma e só acordei agora, como pode eu nunca ter jogado Bioshock na vida? Comprei o Bioshock infinit pois estava em promoção, sem imaginar que iria me apaixonar pelo jogo. Sei que nunca devemos começar a jogar uma triologia pelo 3 jogo, por isso serei obrigado a comprar os anteriores para ter o prazer de jogar essa maravilha, pois pelas análises, é uma trilogia muito bem feita.

Si tu Pc es de las de bajos recursos y generica, no te preocupes y descarga ese juega el cual en mi opinion es uno de los mejores videojuegos jamas creados, tal vez en todo al minimo no disfrutaras su belleza visual que es capaz de tener, pero eso no lo resta casi nada a esta magnifica obra UwU

cara... q jogo na moral pqp. ate n completar o modo historia n sai do pc, zerei em 2 dias.
na real q obra de arte

Una paisaje hermoso, una historia muy buena, y una final bastante triste.

El mejor juego que he jugado hasta ahora.
El mejor juego FPS que jugue hasta ahora. Lo acabo de terminar y lo voy a empezar a jugar otra vez para completarlo al 100%

Gra jest niewiarygodnie nudna. Historia jest ciekawa przez pierwsze 20-30minut. Później BioShock Infinite staje się nuuuuuuudnyy jak flaki z olejem. Piękna grafika, początek był niesamowity. Byłem pewien, że jest to gra, która mnie wciągnie i nawet pożre. Niestety, ku mojemu ogromnemu zdziwieniu - tak się nie stało. Nudna mechanika strzelania, nic nowego. Sama grafika i klimat (który odczuwa się jedynie podczas cutscenek, ale już NIE podczas rozgrywki) gry nie uratuje. Pograłem w chwilę, ale po ok. 40minutach to było coś na zasadzie "jeszcze pogram, skoro każdy tak to poleca, to ta produkcja musi mieć cokolwiek w sobie." No i na to "cokolwiek" czekałem. No cóż, jak można się domyślić, nie doczekałem się.
Zmarnowany potencjał, i wyrzucone pieniądze w błoto. Totalna porażka.

剧情 9/10

综合 9/10
良心的画质和烧脑烧到爆炸的剧情
老婆救我
深深地被这个世界观所吸引。

Биошок, это когда:
• Пропадают текстуры
• Во время добивания ты тупо неуязвим, и ты пользуешься этим моментом, дабы восстановить себе щит (и не ври мне, что ты не юзал эту фичу)
• Когда тебе нужны патроны от картечницы, а она даёт тебе патроны от дробаша (или наоборот, и с другими орудиями также)
• Когда ты на одном дыхании с 1 хп, а Элизабет кидает через пол карты соли
• Когда Элизабет находит то, где того нет (был момент смотрела на картину, и резко ЭЙ БУКЕР Я НАШЛА МОНЕТУ!1)
• Когда у Элизабет в темных местах волосы жёлтого оттенка, а на свету обычные, черные
• Когда тебе приходиться лезть в Гугл, дабы найти русификацию озвучки
• Когда ты понимаешь сюжет, и в то же время и нет
10 Букеров из 10
神作，买了无限的，一定要买dlc，买了dlc的一定要玩一代，玩完一代和无限dlc你会有种我全都明白了的感觉。

This game is so good. The combat is so fun and has a unique twist that alot of shooters dont have. The story was the best in any game ive played and all its twists and turnes are crazy. Overall i would 100% recommend this game; the ending makes it worth every penny. (dont look up any spoilers or guides. learning the story and getting to know the characters was just as fun as playing the game for me.)

В Bioshock Infinite ровно один минус: её совершенно невозможно перепройти. После финала, попытка повторно подвергнуть себя и Элизабет всему этому ощущается чуть ли не кощунством. Хочется только сказать "...и жили мы долго и счастливо, каждый в своем мире".

Uma bost4
Varios poderes, a maioria inútil.
Várias  armas, a maioria inutil e só da pra usar 2
Nao tem chefes
A mira é horrivel, se o personagem estiver carregando e vc for usar um poder, ele vai errar provavelmente. 
Os poderes sao legaais mas sao praticamente inuteis a maioria
Nao da pra aumentar a barra de escudo, nem poder, nem vida. Vc passa o jogo inteiro sem desenvolver praticamente nada. Praticamente nada muda o jogo inteiro, um tédio sem fim. 
Os inimigos são os mesmos a merd4 do jogo inteiro. São uns 5, 6 no maximo. 
A historia é uma bosta
A ultima fase é extremamente dificil e enfadonha e eu desisti pq simplesmente não vale meu tempo e paciencia
Os cenários são muito limitados, por várias vezes no jogo eele te obriga a fazer varias missoes no mesmo lugar, indo e voltando no mesmo cenario igual um idiota. Sim, pois assim eles trabalham menos e criam mais horas de jogo no mesmo mapa ja criado. Se fosse mundo aberto, legal, mas aqui é tudo limitado em enfadonho. 
Decepção. PRimeiro Bioshock que joguei, e nunca mais vou sentar na frente dessa coisa lamentavel. 
É tosco. Ninguem tem coragem de falar mais eu falo.
A melhor coisa do jogo são os peitos da Elizabeth.
a nice game!
Это шедевр!

10/10
Ich habe BS und BS2 jeweils 2x durchgespielt und würde mich als BS Liebhaber und vllt auch als Kenner bezeichnen. Als ich mit diesem hier anfing zu spielen, war ich erst nicht überzeugt. Wo waren die Durchgeknallten? Wo die "Adamzombies", wo die Little Sisters? Wo die Big Daddies?
Schnell war klar, das hier ist kein BS. 
Oder doch?
Ich möchte nicht zu viel spoilern, aber der BS Flair kommt schnell und bleibt. Es ist definitiv ein ganz eigenes BS Erlebnis aber die Art wie die Geschichte erzählt wird, ist großartig. Im Vergleich zu BS2 handelt es sich nicht um einen klassischen Nachkoch-Nachfolger, sondern um ein eingenständiges Spiel mit eigener Mechanik. Ja, sie ist Bioschock-angelehnt aber in sich stimmig. Das Rad haben die Entwickler nicht neu erfunden, aber eben an den richtigen Stellen abgeändert. Und die Story?
Lasst Euch überraschen! 
Einfach Großartig!

5년전 게임이지만 지금봐도 나름 괜찮은 그래픽, 
개성있는 캐릭터와 전자관광느낌나는 아름다운 배경과 음악,
스카이후크,소금,공간열기로 상황에 맞게 능력을 골라가며 사용해야하는 참신한 전투, 
장편 미드 보는 느낌을 주는 복선도 많고 곱씹을 거리도 많은 줄거리등등
소문대로 추천할 안할수 없게 잘만든 명작이라는 생각이 드나..
난잡하고 제약이 많은 무기체계, 쓸데없이 종류만 많은 능력치,
부드럽지 않은 이동이 아쉽네요. 그래도 즐겁게 해볼만 합니다. 추천.

For the sake of God..........Elizabeth is the BEST game companion EVER in the flow of time. Elizabeth is the only Game companion who made me truly devoted to the game and plot......I dont care the gameplay, nor the villians, nor the twists, Elezabeth is the only thing I concern..........

I've been with some decent game NPCs, like Soap or Lady, or maybe numerous NPCs in Skyrim.....but they are no match for Elizabeth...

Man.......I LOVE ELezabeth.....

Ken Levine and Co. did a great job. The atmosphere and story line are terrific. Even though the story is relatively complex, and the narrative changes in a fast pace, it is quite easy to follow and understand what the consequences of one’s actions are. 
The graphics are also well done and look great even after all these years (played at 2018). The gunplay is also good, and the combination of powers (plasmids...) and guns makes the entire experience quite memorable. The only minor disappointment was with the rail gunplay. I expected it to have a major role in the game, which it doesn’t, but when it does take center stage, it is executed flawlessly. 
Again, one of the best experiences I had with a PC game.

第一部实在是令人印象深刻
这一部有点花里胡哨，但仍优秀
系列对于资本主义的描写，还是对客观主义的否定，亦或者是理想主义和现实主义之间的冲突，都是极具探讨和研究的内容，以上内容👴全都不懂，👴只知道伊丽莎白真好用

I do not like FPS games all that much, but I wanted to try this one after reading the positive reviews and my friend's recommendations.
I was not disappointed, on easy you can enjoy the world and the story even if you do not like FPS games. The characters are very likable, the bad guys are awesome.
I did not expect much, but I was pleasantly surprised.
Probably all the things have been said already. It still looks good in 2018. And the plot will be amazing forever for sure.
If you enjoy games with thought-provoking storylines, this will become your all time favorite game. Always had me hooked up until the very end and well into the DLC.

Честно, не понял почему все так тащатся по этой игре. По началу я думал что эта игра неплохая, она давала вам кучу игровых механик недоступных до этого и это было круто и интересно. Но позже желание играть в игру исчезло полностью. Мы все играем в шутеры в первую очередь ради экшена и пострелушек, однако на часу 6-ом игры ты осознаешь, что на те самые пострелушки уходит около 30% всего игрового времени. Остальные 70% вы идете от точки А к точке В, причем иногда просто чтобы растянуть игровое время. Многие хвалят игру за сюжет, но он мне был совершенно непонятен. Этой притензии не было бы если бы игра не "впихавала" в вас этот сюжет.

Я не в коем случае не хочу сказать что игра говно. Если выше названные мною минусы вас не смущают покупайте игру. Но если мои слова заставили вас сомневаться в покупке— лучше этого делать не стоит.

通关后没碰游戏至少一个星期内，无论在做什么我的脑海中总会偶尔响起那声带些担忧焦急和甜美清脆的“Booker！”，多么令我想念令我安心的声音啊。深知她与他的一切不再存在这个世界上，化为虚无，只能不断回忆和思考过去那段在哥伦比亚生死难忘的经历和他们错误却宝贵的人生。
[h1]10/10[/h1]
它不一定是最好玩，但这个游戏（包括整个系列）绝对是我接触过整体感观最好，感触最深，印象最剧烈的第一人称游戏。
[h1]流程：爽的一批，思考人生[/h1]
线性流程结合小型可自由探索地图，充分流畅地阐述了出一个引人落泪、逻辑深厚的庞大剧情。除了线性主线剧情外，中途可以探索许多哥伦比亚的其他角落，从而了解哥伦比亚不为人知的事实，这是生化奇兵系列营造游戏世界观和某些人物背景的传统亮点。男女主人公人设一开始就能吸引玩家的好奇，一个是身负巨债的中年男子，一个是神秘纯粹的可爱少女，大叔少女搭配我真的无法拒绝。等你上手游戏，就会发现ELIZABETH绝对是最最最有价值的队友，游戏史上的范围。游戏中的种种经历让所有人会觉得她的存在如此真实，又如此可靠，更如此吸引我去追随她，与她的互动无时不刻都在牵动记忆。
以下剧透，引导理解剧情，未玩慎重：
[spoiler]第一次体验剧情很有可能会是一头雾水不知道发生了什么，因为游戏的时间并非一切开始的时候，没错，而是从中间开始的。首先游戏一开始涉及了平行时空的概念。这个概念是由伊丽莎白也就是女主角的能力展开的，而这个能力是由两位科学家夫妇研究出来的（老是神神秘秘出现说怪话的那两位），至于研究的前因后果游戏里会找到答案。当然伊丽莎白并非天生具有超能力，而是因为童年某件大事导致手指受伤而获得的能力。既然出现了平行时空和女主角能够干涉不同位面时空的能力，那么说明不同的平行世界包括我们看到的世界是会有交织的。不仅过去也有未来，这些交织都是一定会遵循时间发生的，而且遵循时间悖论规则的，结局便是如此。[/spoiler]
此外，无限实际上是发生在比1、2代之前的故事，因此哥伦比亚城内甚至前作的角色都有不同程度的着墨，对于想要了解BIOSHOCK的世界观是必不可少的。（特别是海葬DLC两部曲，不能错过）
[h1]操作：爽得几批，近战爆炸[/h1]
从游戏性看，丰富独特的武器库都爱不释手，一手技能盘依旧炫酷耐玩实用，能在流程中收集各种服装解锁各种bug般的buff可以减少战斗的压力，所以不要错过哥伦比亚的任何角落。每一场战斗都是爽快激烈。在开启困难或以上难度后，主角变脆敌人输出变高，战斗某些地方即便过于挑战性不能实行无双打法，只要使用滑轨攻击和适当配合技能像是迷惑和疾风配合转移火力之后也并非难事。
[h1]设定：我可以站着看一年[/h1]
从艺术性看，那更不用我多说了，初入哥伦比亚相信所有人第一眼就能看到虎躯一震，建筑、色彩、人设风格，反乌托邦的背景，逻辑紧密又充满细节引人深思的剧情，我只能感叹游戏艺术瑰宝当之无愧，任何的形容都是无力的，只有亲眼见证才是最好的。

至于bug的话就算游戏崩溃是最严重的，我是关掉了垂直同步和换英语输入法之后问题基本解决，但还是有机率发生。
游戏是好游戏。，就是玩着玩着各种突然卡死。，玩你🐎呢

This one is an interesting one.  While I'll still recommend it and I don't nearly have as much of a mixed relation as I do with say The Last of Us, I still find this game to be a mixed experience.  The gunplay is solid, the characters at least hold more water than characters from The Last of Us, and the environments do look cartoonishly pretty, but my boner dies at the two-thirds point right after you kill Daisy Fitsroy.

[spoiler]Uuuhh... Spoilers.  Look, this game has been out for five years now.  Don't act surprised.[/spoiler]

The worst sin has to be the climax where there's a pseudo tower-defense sequence where you have to kill an overwhemling number of enemies with very limited supplies and prevent them from blowing up a generator necessary for getting to the ending.  It's a gut-punch that ultimately takes any air out of the emotional impact, and while I'm still left stunned, it could be much stronger.

Pros:
-Soundtrack bears a lingering sense of melancholy.  Don't let the pretty colors of the first act fool you.
-The guns feel great and actually kick. For the most part does scale well with difficulty.  You will get melted on later difficulties, though.  Combat is smooth and does provide ample opportunities to kill enemies with both weapons and vigors.  While the environment does provide opportunities to enhance your vigors, you'll probably fall into the habit of shooting instead, while the vigors are more like fancy grenades.
-[strike]Joel and Ellie[/strike] Booker and Elizabeth are at least consistent enough throughout the experience.  I guess going through different timelines rapidly could easily take a physical toll on one's moral, so I'm not going to fuss about it too much.
-Nice that we don't have to constantly act as a human shield, but her existence as a character does fade a bit in favor of her existence as a utility. [strike]Back to the kitchen where you belong![/strike]
-Shooting sky-racists is much like shooting Nazis.  You don't have to justify jack-squat for blowing the 384th enemy's head to a fine red pulp.
-Plenty of upgrades to go around as you go deeper.  While it's not something like a skill tree or collectables, you buy upgrades for your weapons at vendors, find lockpicks to get into areas with extras, vials meant for buffing your shields, health, or vigor reserves, find randomized "gear" in set spots or as drops from Handymen which provide a variety of passive buffs that vary in utility based on personal preference.  It does make scavenging every part of the map for money and mashing 'E' on every interactable element vital to the progression.
-Interesting to see a city of spectacular tech and a flawed philosophy that hasn't gone completely to hell yet.  Burial at Sea DLC does provide an interesting perspective of what life on Rapture was like before the civil war happened.
-Despite the flaws of the last third of the game, the ending does leave an emotional impact as all of the story's elements are finally revealed, the truth behind the madness that is Father Comstock, and the conclusion of Booker's arch.

Cons:
-The Vox Populi are a resistance group composed of the various down-trodden classes fighting against the Founder ruling class.  A case of Right vs. Left.  They compose of for the most part Irish and Blacks.  The main problem is why does their brief intro getting the player to root for them only to pull a twist and pose the leader, Daisy Fitsroy as a secondary antagonist?  And no, getting to shoot up retextured enemy models isn't an excuse.
-I think I collectively speak for everyone when I say fuck the Ghost-boss fight.  Fuck this bossfight in particular.
-Holy fuck, this game loves jerking itself off regarding the complexity of its ending with bits of foreshadowing every step of the way.  I don't mind the fact that it theoretically doesn't work, but I'm still miffed by the fact that it's all undermined by...
-The last mission.  After rescuing Elizabeth again from her tormentors, you race aboard an airship with Father Comstock aboard to get back to the tower from the beginning of the game.  The excess of Founding Father Mechs may bother you, but then there's the trip up to the ship itself, which not only confines you to the space of a single tugboat to fight on while enemy soldiers with rocket launchers bombard your tiny platform, a bit more acceptable spacing, a fight inside of a compact engine room with more rocket launchers and a Handyman, killing Father Comstock, and then the aforementioned tower defense sequence at the top of the airship against waves of Vox Populi as you make the final run to Elizabeth's tower.  Your job is to defend the exposed generator on top from exploding.  You will die at least once regardless of difficulty. If you're playing on 1999 Mode (hardest difficulty, only for masochists and completionists), you'll probably want to hold on buying anything the moment this chapter starts to have enough money to avoid losing your save file.
-I have a hard time convincing myself that when my game stutters that it's because of my hardware.  My current rig is capable of handling Deus Ex: Mankind Divided and DOOM 4 on high settings and smoothly, so I should have no problem handling this game with no drops in frame rate.  While maybe autosaves can understandably cause performance drops, this game causes drops in other places at well randomly and with moderate frequency.
-There is a piece of gear that allows for the expansion of ammo capacity, but why is there little else to increase the ammo limitations of most weapons?  Provided that moments with Elizabeth to have a chance for her to hand off some ammo to you mid combat along with health, salts to recharge your vigors, and money during down time/after looting money/after looking at a vendor without buying anything, it feels very limiting to utilize some weapons.  I use the M1 Carbine lookalike because it doles out good firepower and a healthy ammo pool to boot, it still doesn't feel like enough, especially after fighting a miniboss. The only weapon upgrade that allows for higher ammo capacity is for the starting C96.

6.9/10 It's good, enjoyable game for the first three quarters/two thirds, but then becomes a bit of a slog thereafter.  It doesn't help that the game hasn't aged perfectly.  It's best played with hiatuses in between playthroughs.

There are many people that like this game, but I am not one of them. The graphics are a step up from bioshock 1 and 2, but the story is not the best. There are many plot holes created by through contradicting statements, the characters weren’t that interesting, and I never really felt invested in it. Sure, some parts of the combat are better than the first two, but I never played bioshock for the combat.  I played it for the story and atmosphere, but in this game it really wasn’t  there for me. This is not a terrible game by all means, but in my opinion, it is not worthy of the Bioshock title.
短发赛高

剧情满分
  AI 满分

I am not sure why this game is rated so highly. I'll start off with the pros of the game. First, the game will run on a potato and still look good for the present day. The controls and gameplay are very fluid. I never encountered a bug, glitch, or probelm except for the occasional mishap hitting a skyline. The enviorment and colors are very vibrant and captivating. The story starts off confusing and slow then becomes interesting; however, it falls short for even to be called a story line. Now for the cons of the game. The game is incredible short. Don't let my hours fool you, I spent a good amount of time with the game idle while I would do other things around my house. I probably finished the game in about 6-8 hours. The story is very confusing and right when it becomes interesting, it smacks you in the face with a horrible cliffhanger and no explanation on really anything up until that point. There really is no use at upgrading teir 2 guns in this game due to not finding them often and the game ends right when they become avaiable for upgraes. The power abilities in the game are almost worthless as well since you really only need one or two of them. The last ability given which is a type of shield has no use since there is only about an hour of gameplay left. There are zero bosses in the game and only one semi-difficult encounter. The gear setup for the character that allows different perks is as well almost worthless. You never feel like you have the option to play around with different play styles for the gear nor should you since its so short and all the enemies are exactly the same. I played the game on medium and only died less then five times and I'm not even good at FPS's. There are only about two or three side missions which don't even feel like side missions. Zero replay value in my opinion as well. The game makes you feel like you are going to advanced to a new part and all these new teir 2 guns are going to be put to use and same with your abilities and skills. Naaaa not going to happen. You will never use any of your abilities except for maybe 3 total because you won't find the need to. I'm not sure if this game should even be called a real fps or more of a casual mystery story with fps elements type of game. I feel jipped for the content even though I bought this on sale. If you are a huge fan it might be worth the play through for you; however, if you are looking for a good fps with lots of depth and cuztomization, stay away. They lure you in with all the abilities and different types of gear just to end the game so you never feel like you used them. The end credits of the game is about the only thing that feels complete.

[h1]10/10，满分神作，不必过多解释。[/h1]

[b]一路走来，《生化奇兵·无限》给了我太多震撼。[/b]
震撼于伴随着一声“哈利路亚”升上天空，如同进入天堂般的奇妙感觉；
震撼于推开修道院大门，第一次看到哥伦比亚的美妙景色；
震撼于美景背后，蒸汽朋克和反乌托邦构建出的社会现实；
震撼于剧情背后，多元时间的复杂和无限可能性；

剧情方面，毫无槽点，尽管时间线的纠缠有些难以理解。10/10。
游戏性方面，流畅的打斗和空轨介入的三维战斗模式令人欲罢不能；兵种的设计中规中矩；武器和魔法的搭配也会产生很多不同的战斗方法，手残玩家表示会不停思考更多打法。9.8/10。
音乐方面，几乎可以进入近些年玩到的游戏中，音乐制作平均水平最高的一档。无论是宗教风格音乐、民谣、纯音乐还是合唱，都完美契合剧情和人物形象。许多歌曲甚至值得被反复聆听。10/10。
[i]推荐Will the Circle be Unbroken ，大爱[/i]
画面风格方面，可以说是很有艺术感了。复古风格的绘画特色、鲜艳亮丽的色彩搭配都值得一看。10/10。

[h1]第九艺术，诚不我欺！[/h1]

Erst war ich ja nciht so der Fan von Shootern, aber eine Kollegin hat mir das game emfpohlen, also hab cih es trotzdem mal ausprobiert... Zum Glück, ich habe echt was verpasst in der Zeit, als ich das Spiel ignoriert habe, sehr sehr sehr geiles Game :D

Die story ist echt cool, die Welt ist Liebevoll designet und es gibt überall was zu entdecken, die englische vertonung ist super gemacht, auch die Charaktere gewinnt man schnell lieb und das Spielgefühl war genial :D

Ich liebe die offene Spielwelt in den Wolken, so viel zu erkunden, so viel offenheit, ich habe schnell die Sniper (in Kombi mit Schrotflinte) lieben gelernt, für diese Welt ist sie genial. Auch Elizabeth ist echt gut gemacht, in anderen Spielen nervt man sich ja über die KI der Begleiter, aber Liz versteckt sich, gibt mir Munition, Salze und Health und lässt sich vorallem nciht abknallen^^

Die ganze Story rund um Elzabeth ist echt spannend mit paar Wendungen, und wenn man dann erst die DLCs spielt und noch mehr von der Story lernt, heieiei...

Zu den DLCs: die Schlacht in den WOlken ist nett, bisschen rumballern, aber wird irgendwann langweilig, weil bisschen der SInn, die Story fehlt. Die Episoden in Rapture hingegen fügen wieder einiges an story und eine neue Spielwelt, die frei zu erkunden ist, hinzu. die erste Epsisode erschien mir etwas kurz, das Ende kam dann etwas abrupt, und heieiei, that twist, damit hätte ich echt nicht gerechnet. 
Die zweite Episode hat mi noch mehr gefallen, der Schleich-Aspekt bringt eine gelungene und spassige Abwechslung in das Spiel. Statt rumzurennen und alles über den Haufen zu schiessen, weil man ja eh nen Schild hat, kann man sich jetzt still und heimlich durch grosse Gebiete schleichen und Gegner um Gegner gekonnt und lautlos ausschalten, wenn doch was kommt, betäubt man sie halt, oder knallt sie mit der Shotgun ab, die einzige Waffe, die etwas Schaden macht, und das ist auch gut so, es geht schliesslich ums Schleichen. AUf jeden Fall hatte ich sehr viel Spass am Erkunden. Das Ende wurde dann schon sehr düster und creepy, nciht ganz so mein Geschmack, aber ich habs durchgestanden. Und die story wird mit einem spannenden Finale abgeschlossen.

[spoiler]Aber das Ende von Episode 2 ist ja mal enorm dark/sad... Man hat so lange mit Elizabeth gekämpft, sich durchgeschlichen, mit ihr vom Songbird geflüchtet, und dann wird sie einfach getötet... unbefriedigend^^[/spoiler]

Die Jumpscares hättet ihr aber gerne lassen können, die sind fies^^

Tldr: Hatte gut 24 Stunden Spass an dem Spiel mit allen DLCs, eine sehr gute Zeit :D

早就在某个那up知道了剧情是我最后悔的。

如果看到这个测评，你还不知道游戏剧情，请一定不要去看去了解，不然会失去最大的乐趣。
你只要知道在这个游戏里，伊丽莎白就是你的一切。

Oezu długo zwlekałam z napisaniem recenzji po zagraniu, ale w końcu myślę że jestem na siłach ;)

+ Bardzo ciekawa i pogmatwana fabuła
+ Całkiem okey grafika (no z wyjątkiem większych głów postaci xD)
+ Łatwy interfejs, w którym nie da się zubić
+ Duża ilość broni i dzięki czemu można było mieć różne odczucia z gry
+ Na samym starcie przed włączeniem gry twórcy wymusili ustawienie poziomu jasności, dzięki temu nie trzeba było tego wyszukiwać w ustawieniach :)

+/- Duża ilość osiągnięć, ale niestety większość wbija się podczas jednej rozgrywki
+/- Miałam wrażenie, że postać jest za niska. Jest to do przestawienia się, no chyba że gra sie w kilka gier naraz :T
+/- Elizabeth podczas walk nie rzucała potrzebnych przedmiotów (co niepotrzebnie utrudniało rozgrywkę) 

- Gra była za łatwa, no z wyjątiem ostatniego rozdziału, przeskok w trudności był (przynajmiej dla mnie) za duży
- Osobiście dla mnie niektóre lokacje były zbyt duże przez co trochę błądziłam
- Postaci Elizabeth, jak mnie ona wkurzała. Dobrze że nadrabiała to urodą xD

Jeszcze zostało mi zagranie w DLC, ale raczej moje zdanie o grze się nie zmieni :)

Honestamente? o pior jogo da saga! Mas isso não quer dizer que seja ruim. Muito pelo contrário!
A história se passa nem antes, nem depois dos outros Bioshocks, muito pelo contrário, e você só vai entender isso se jogar kk.
Os gráficos são lindos e as animações gráficas são simplesmente impressionantes, você vai, varias vezes, se encontrar seduzido pelas expressões faciais dos personagens e observando as ações deles sem fazer nada.
A história, como sempre nessa trilogia, é a melhor parte desse jogo, não tem começo, nem meio e muito menos um fim.
Uma experiência muito mais filosófica do que qualquer outra coisa. Recomendadíssimo, mas a experiência completa você só vai ter se jogar os outros 2 da franquia antes.

Восхитительная игра! Здесь и отличная атмосфера города, парящего в облаках, захватывающий сюжет и геймплей. Присутствует множество различного оружия, которое, как и в прошлых частях, поддаётся улучшениям. Также присутствуют и свои плазмиды, именуемые энергетиками. А ещё в игре есть неплохая такая особь ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°). Думаю, что уже многие прошли эту замечательную игру, но тем, кто всё ещё не прошёл, советую её пройти в скором времени, и лучше с самого начала этой серии.

Nejdřív mě to moc nebavilo, byl to nezvyk oproti puvodním dvěma dílum. Tady je to víceméně linearní střílečka bez mapy, se šipkou, která vede k cíli. Ale po čase se to příběhově rozjelo a asi jsem si celkově zvykl, takže hodnotím kladně. Místo plasmidů jsou tu vigory (ve finále to samé), zbraně už unesete je dvě, takže je potřeba vybírat (podle mě je nejlepší Karabina, kterou jsem používal v 99% případu) a celkem zábavná je i nebeská dráha :-). Klasicky je tu vylepšovíní zbraní (za peníze) a vylepšování vigorů (taky za peníze), novinkou je výstroj, která je ale spíš jen pro spestření.
Takže když bych to shrnul, tak důstojné pokračování výborné jedničky a dvojky.

Возможно я воробушек, но я так и не понял концовки. [spoiler] Какого хера меня утопили, я чё самый черны чтоли, алё шо происходит?[/spoiler]. А так игра ахриненная, просто всю игру можно кнопку сриншота не отжимать.

What an amazing game. Skylines provide the funnest combat I've ever had in any game, and Elizabeth is the most useful companion character in any game I've played. Plus she's missing the same finger I am!
It's like one of those books/movies/tv shows where, when you finish it, it's all you can think of for the next few days.
If anyone says video games can't be art, I'd recommend them to try this game.
